title: Israel team, JD Vance booed at Olympics opening ceremony
desc: Cheers for the large U.S. team quickly turned to boos when U.S. Vice President JD Vance was shown on the stadium's big screen.

title: Canadian Researchers Map the Milky Way's Magnetic Field
desc: An international team of researchers have published two papers that reveal a new model for how the magnetic field of the Milky Way evolved.

title: Amazon spending looks painful but it's not a reason to sell
desc: Amazon shares fell 7% on Friday after management issued a 2026 capital expenditures guide of $200 billion.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Why is Charlize Theron speaking out for peace at Milano Cortina 2026?
desc: The South African-born movie star will deliver a message of peace at the Opening Ceremony. Find out more about who she is and her connection to the event.

title: Chelsea FC star spotted in training ahead of Wolves clash after injury update from Liam Rosenior
desc: Positive signs for Chelsea supporters before the Premier League meeting against Wolves

title: It just got easier for Claude to check in on your WordPress site
desc: WordPress users can now leverage Claude to analyze web traffic or find information about other internal site metrics.

title: Nancy Guthrie may have been abducted in a 41-minute window, authorities say
desc: Nancy Guthrie was last seen alive when a relative dropped her outside her Tuscan home after a family games night. The 84-year-old grandmother has now been missing for a week.

title: 'Invisible scaffolding of the universe' revealed in ambitious new James Webb telescope images
desc: A team of researchers using the James Webb Space Telescope has produced the most detailed map of dark matter to date.

title: Thousands Of Travellers Grounded In Asia As Thailand, Singapore, Japan, China, India, Indonesia, And Türkiye Delay 4,099 And Cancel 76 Flights, Disrupting AirAsia, Singapore, Pegasus, Cathay Pacific,
desc: Thousands of passengers stranded in Asia today as 4,175 flight cancellations and delays hit Mumbai, Bangkok, Osaka, Jakarta, Singapore, Istanbul, Phuket, more.

title: Why are Italy’s volleyball teams being honoured at the Opening Ceremony?
desc: Italy's national volleyball teams crowned a phenomenal 2025 season winning both the men's and women's world titles. The teams are honoured at the opening ceremony on Friday (6 February), in a celebration of Italy’s sporting excellence and unity.
